summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 9, 2019. It includes count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms detailing inmate populations, assignments, and movements within the facility. The most notable entry is inmate Jeffrey Epstein, who is listed on an attorney visit roster.

events.title: Daily inmate counts and assignments at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative procedures including inmate counts, out-counts, and roster updates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate 76318-054) is documented as being held at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 9, 2019.
The document shows Epstein was on an attorney visit (ATTY) roster and assigned to housing unit Z04-206LAD on that date.
Several other inmates are listed with assignments marked 'SUICIDE OR', indicating suicide observation status.
The forms are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative records for tracking inmate population, counts, and movements within the facility.
The date of these records is August 9, 2019, which is the day before Epstein was found dead in his cell on August 10, 2019.
